item.description:
"GRISHA GORYACHEV and JEROME MOUFFE are two young guitarists you absolutely must see and hear to believe. Grishaâ€™s almost-ridiculous technical wizardry and absolute command of the Flamenco genre have blown away audiences around the world. Jerome embodies the virtues of the great age of the Romantic guitar: effortless virtuosity and dramatic emotions. Grisha and Jerome will play both solos and duos."

I saw Jerome Mouffe in concert last year, and have developed a new appreciation for classical guitar as a result of his incredible musicianship. (Plus, the show where I saw him was a benefit concert for the Bhopal, India, chemical disaster--so big ups to the fact that he supports worthy causes!)

Tickets: http://www.itsmyseat.com//events/964645.html



EDIT: I've also crossposted this to the Boston Classical Meetup and at least one person's coming through there. Let's meet outside afterwards and find a nearby place to get a drink or something. Look for the tall Indian chick with glasses. :)
item.name: Grisha Goryachev and Jerome Mouffe - Flamenco and Classical Guitar
